languages.text: Пока живы копии осколка К'тан или активен Энергетический шар, каждая атака по осколку К'тан накладывает на него эффект "реконцептуализация", а на атакующего — эффект "зеркальное воздаяние".
languages.original_text: As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb persist, each attack against the C'tan Shard will impose the reconceptualisation effect on the Shard itself and trigger the reflective retribution effect on the attacker.

traits.locale_text: Пока живы копии осколка К'тан или активен Энергетический шар, каждая атака по осколку К'тан накладывает на него эффект "реконцептуализация", а на атакующего — эффект "зеркальное воздаяние".

languages.text: As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.

traits.locale_text: As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.
As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.
As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.

languages.text: Tant qu'il reste une copie d'Écharde ou l'Orbe d'énergie, à chaque fois qu'elle est attaquée, l'Écharde C'tan gagne un cumul de reconceptualisation et déclenche Rétribution réflective sur l'attaquant.
languages.original_text: As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.

traits.locale_text: Tant qu'il reste une Copie d'Écharde ou l'Orbe d'énergie, à chaque fois qu'elle est attaquée, l'Écharde C'tan gagne un cumul de reconceptualisation et déclenche Rétribution réflective sur l'attaquant.

languages.text: Sind "Scherbenkopie" oder "Energiekugel" verfügbar, erhält das C'tan-Fragment jedes Mal, wenn es angegriffen wird, einen Stapel "Neukonzeptualisierung" und belegt den Angreifer mit "Reflektive Vergeltung".
languages.original_text: As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.

traits.locale_text: Solange noch Scherbenkopien oder die Energiekugel da sind, erhält das C‘tan-Fragment jedes Mal, wenn es angegriffen wird, einen Stapel Neukonzeptualisierung und löst beim Angreifer Reflektive Vergeltung aus.

languages.text: シャード・コピーやエネルギー・オーブが残っている限り、攻撃される度に、ク＝タン・シャードは再概念化を1スタック得て、攻撃者に反射的報復を発動させる。
languages.original_text: As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.

traits.locale_text: シャード・コピーやエネルギー・オーブが残っている限り、攻撃される度に、ク＝タン・シャードは再概念化を1スタック得て、攻撃者に反射的報復を発動させる。

languages.text: 只要星神碎片或能量之球存在，每当星神碎片遭到攻击时，都会获得1层“概念重塑”效果，并激发攻击者身上的“复仇反射”效果。
languages.original_text: As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.

traits.locale_text: 只要星神碎片或能量之球存在，每当星神碎片遭到攻击时，都会获得1层“概念重塑”效果，并激发攻击者身上的“复仇反射”效果。

languages.text: Mientras haya al menos una copia de fragmento o el orbe de energía siga activo, cada vez que reciba un ataque, el fragmento de C'tan gana una acumulación de Reconceptualización y activa Retribución reflejada contra el atacante.
languages.original_text: As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.

traits.locale_text: Mientras haya al menos una copia de fragmento o el orbe de energía siga activo, cada vez que reciba un ataque, el fragmento de C'tan gana una acumulación de Reconceptualización y activa Retribución reflejada contra el atacante.

languages.text: Parça'nın Kopyalarından herhangi biri sağ veya Enerji Küresi etkin olduğu müddetçe C'tan Parçası'na yapılan her saldırı, ona bir tekrar kavramsallaştırma birikimi kazandırırken saldırganda da yansıtıcı öç etkisini tetikler.
languages.original_text: As long as any Shard Copy or the Energy Orb remain, each time it is attacked, the C'tan Shard will gain a stack of reconceptualisation and trigger reflective retribution on the attacker.
